page.title: 07COUNTY HALL-GLENFIELD
page.content: The present day building is divided into departments including-Chief Executive,Treasury,Education,Property, Planning and Transportation,Trading Standards and a Library. Altogether there are over 400 rooms and more than 1500 people working there. 13 of the 200 children at The Hall Primary School,Glenfield have parents who work at County Hall. Facilities provided for the employees include a restaurant/cafe,bank,shop, hairdresser,sports and social club, tennis and sports ground and nursing care. {'EMERGENCY PLANNING AND CO-ORDINATION { CENTRE'}in the grounds of County Hall would be used in a civil disaster like a tornado or an air disaster in the county.In case of a nuclear war,it would be the communications centre for the East Midlands.
